Messages displayed when the "starred" quickfilter is selected are not threaded even when view is the set to "threads" "all."  This makes it difficult to investigate messages related to the starred message that are downthread or upthread. 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Star some threaded messages
2.Select "starred" in the Quick Filter.
3.Attempt to browser messages upthread or downthread of the starred message. 


Expected Results:  
Be able to to browse messages down or upthread. 

Present user with threaded view that can be expanded so that messages upthread / downthread can be viewed.
